Test Name: Mucopolysaccharidosis IV (Morquio Syndrome) Enzyme Panel, Leukocytes
Purpose: To measure GALNS and GLB1 enzyme activities in leukocytes to aid in the diagnosis of Mucopolysaccharidosis IV A and IV B (Morquio Syndrome).
Equipment: Microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, spectrophotometer or fluorometer, pipettes
